title: Smart Watch for Women Men, 1.96" Fitness Tracker Running Watch (Answer/Make Call), IP68 Waterproof, Pedometer, Sleep/Step/Activity/Heart Rate Monitor, 110+ Sport Modes Smartwatch for Adroid iOS, Pink
description: Coucur Y66 2024 New Fitness Tarcker Smart Watch
Smart watch that can Make/Answer Calls and Read Smart Notifications

The smart watch for men and women uses the latest Bluetooth 5.3 connection technology, which can answer/make calls stably and clearly. At the same time, you will accurately receive text messages, information notifications from Facebook, Youtube, ins, tiktok and other APPs, helping you not to miss any information and news. Effectively solve the situation that it is inconvenient to look at the mobile phone when you are meeting, exercising or else.
24-Hour activity tracking watch

During your exercise, the smartwatch will record your data like heart rate, steps, calories burned, distance in real time. With this logging data, you can better understand your own exercise and share it with your friends or family.
100+ sports modes fitness tracker watch
The activity tracker watch supports 100+ sports modes, including Running, Walking, Hiking, Basketball, Boating, Climbing, Cycling, Fitness, Football and so on.
24/7 health monitoring smartwatch

The fitness tracker is equipped with high-performance optical sensors that will record your all day activities, achieve your wellness goals. Fitness watch accurately monitors your heart rate, blood oxygen, stress levels, sleep status, etc. You can view a week's worth of health reports in app.
Sleep Tracking
: Score your sleep quality and makeprofessional suggestions, so you can sleep better.
Heart Rate Monitoring
: Real-time monitoring of your heart rate, timely detection of problems to protect your health.
Multi-function smartwatch

More useful features are waiting for you to discover, such as timer, stopwatch, alarm clock, sedentary reminder, music control, weather forecast, brightness adjustment, photo control, calculator, etc.
1.96'' HD Touch Screen smart watch

The smart watch is equipped with a 1.96" HD full touch color screen, delivering highly responsive touch, which can bring you a unique visual and better interactive experience. With the companion GloryFit app, you can download more than 200 free personalised watch faces and set it as your desktop. In addition, you can also select your favorite photo like family, selfie, landscape photo as a wallpaper to make your own stylish smartwatch.
IP68 Waterproof
Smart watch with lP68 waterproof function, can shower, rain, swimming, etc.
Long Battery Life

The fitness tarcker smart watch has a built-in large capacity battery, which can be fully charged in 2 hours, can be used for up to 7 days and has a long standby time of about 30 days.  The list of products you will receive are smartwatch *1, original strap *1, charging cable *1, manual *1.
